column1: An Improved Hierarchical Datastructure for Nearest Neighbor Search
Nearest neighbor search is a fundamental computational tool and has wide applications. In past decades
column2: many datastructures have been developed to speed up this operation. In this paper
column3: we propose a novel hierarchical datastructure for nearest neighbor search in moderately high dimension. Our proposed method maintains good run time guarantees
column4: and it outperforms several state-of-the-art methods in practice.
